title: Federal Reserve Announces Latest Rate Hike
description:
The Fed continues to tighten monetary policy in effort to combat inflation. What Ford’s October sales indicate about the broader car industry. Plus, Paramount’s earnings. Host: Jackson Cantrell.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
